adHeader: Freelance PHOTOSHOP Pro: Retouch to Graphic Design!
adDetails: CA based freelance Photoshop artist with over 14 years experience! Free consultation and estimate. My rate is a competitive $35/hour and I accept payment via PayPal or credit card. A 50% deposit is required on most projects. -- Photo retouch/edit from basic to advanced -- Change background, add or remove a person or object, change colors, etc. -- Photo-based illustration: architectural proposals, book/story illustrations, etc. -- Graphic design: fliers, posters, CD/DVD covers, etc. Please note: I will not accept any project that appears to be shady or illegal: changing bank statements, fake IDs, adding a different name to a diploma, etc.
